entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h this morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming west 30 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 5 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 26 December 2022
